name: Space Panda (Hari Jeung, Kat Byers, JordanJenkins)
name_original: Space Panda (Hari Jeung, Kat Byers, JordanJenkins)
description:
A very short 2D plat-former game based around the concept of a Panda in space launched into space and needs to make it back to it's space ship before running out of oxygen! Along the way the Panda must dodge aliens and collect oxygen bubbles while jumping on asteroids towards the space ship.

Roles:

  • Hari Jeung
    • 2D spites, environment art-assets, level design, 
  • Jordan Jenkins
    • level design, documentation
  • Kat Byers
    • scripting
CREDIT:

- Music/SFX from Youtube and freesound.org
